sentences.en: a satellite's -eye view of global warming.
sentences.cn: 从人造卫星上观测到的全球变暖现象。。

sentences.en: A surgeon needs a good eye and a steady hand.
sentences.cn: 做外科医生眼要准，手要稳。

sentences.en: applicants should have an eye for detail.
sentences.cn: 申请者对细节应该独具慧眼。

sentences.en: As she turned back, a movement across the lawn caught her eye.
sentences.cn: 她转过身，瞥见有个东西从草地上穿了过去。

sentences.en: Bankers are keeping a wary eye on the outcome.
sentences.cn: 银行家们对结果保持高度警惕。

sentences.en: he couldn't close his eyes to the truth—he had cancer.
sentences.cn: 他无法回避这个事实——他患了癌症。

sentences.en: He has a visual impairment in the right eye.
sentences.cn: 他右眼视力有损伤。

sentences.en: he kept &B{half an eye on} the house as he worked.
sentences.cn: 他干着活，顺便照看一下房子。

sentences.en: he saw his life's work destroyed before his very eyes.
sentences.cn: 他亲眼目睹自己毕生的心血毁于一旦。

sentences.en: He turned his good eye on me and laughed.
sentences.cn: 他用那只健全的眼睛看着我笑了。

sentences.en: He’s got beautiful eyes.
sentences.cn: 他有一双漂亮的眼睛。

sentences.en: His captaincy of the team was ended by mild eye trouble.
sentences.cn: 他由于患轻度眼疾而不再担任队长一职。

sentences.en: I'd never clapped eyes on the guy before.
sentences.cn: 我以前从未见过这小伙子。

sentences.en: I've got my eye in now; I'm landing them just where I want them.
sentences.cn: 我现对得很准，正把它们降在我想要的地方。

sentences.en: In his mind's eye, he can imagine the effect he's having.
sentences.cn: 他能在脑海里想象出将会达到的效果。

sentences.en: It was yet another case where the human eye outperformed radar.
sentences.cn: 这是肉眼胜过雷达的又一事例。

sentences.en: Ow! I’ve got something in my eye!
sentences.cn: 哎呀！我眼睛里进了什么东西！

sentences.en: The bowlers at the eye of the storm were nowhere in evidence.
sentences.cn: 处于风口浪尖的那些投手不见了踪影。

sentences.en: The layout should be clear and easy on the eye.
sentences.cn: 版式应该清晰悦目。

sentences.en: The planet Mars will be visible to the naked eye all week.
sentences.cn: 整周都可以用肉眼观察到火星。

sentences.en: The product is still only a gleam in an engineer's eye.
sentences.cn: 该产品还只是工程师头脑中尚未成形的想法。

sentences.en: The worms cannot be seen by the naked eye.
sentences.cn: 这些虫子用肉眼看不见。

sentences.en: There were tears in her eyes as she listened to the story.
sentences.cn: 她听故事时眼里噙着泪水。

sentences.en: These designs demonstrate her unerring eye for colour and detail.
sentences.cn: 这些设计体现了她对颜色和细节的精准眼光。

sentences.en: this blonde was giving me the eye.
sentences.cn: 那位金发女郎正向我送秋波。

sentences.en: This study is described under "General Diseases of the Eye"
sentences.cn: “普通眼科疾病”这一部分里对该项研究作了描述。

sentences.en: when I read about his arrest my eyes popped out on stalks.
sentences.cn: 读到他被捕的消息时我真是弹落了眼睛。

sentences.en: When we go out, girls are always giving me the evil eye.
sentences.cn: 我们出去时，女孩子们总是用忌妒的眼神看着我。

words.tran_cn: 看；注视；考虑（eye的过去分词）
[解剖]眼睛；视力；眼光；见解，观点

phrases.tran_cn: 从…处看到的景象；…　的立场（或观点）。 参见 bird's-eye view, worm's-eye view
目不转睛；众目睽睽；聚精会神地看
对…很有兴趣，对…有很深的爱好；对…有敏锐的鉴赏力；能欣赏；能判断

phrases.phrase: an eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth
phrases.tran_cn: 以眼还眼，以牙还牙；以其人之道还治其人之身
不费劲地随便一看，望一眼

phrases.phrase: before (或 in front of, under) one's (very) eyes
phrases.tran_cn: 就在某人眼前；当某人的面（表强调，尤用于令人吃惊或不快的事）
黑眼圈；被打得发青的眼圈；丑事
对于（不受欢迎或令人不快之事）视若无睹，故意忽略；不承认，不理会

phrases.phrase: eyes front (或 left 或 right)

phrases.tran_cn: [澳大利亚、新西兰口语]全力以赴，竭尽全力
(英)对（从事的任务或工作）目测准确；眼光准确
(非正式)（向某人）抛媚眼，送秋波，眉目传情
对…独具慧眼；能辨别；能判断
广为人知的；受公众瞩目的
v. 照看；留意；密切注视
群众的眼睛；社会的注意
adv. 从表面上看来；公然

trans.tran_en: one of the two parts of the body that you use to see with
one of the two parts of the body that you use to see with
one of the two parts of the body that you use to see with
to look at someone or something carefully, especially because you do not trust them or because you want something
